page.title: 10Tourism in Bognor Regis
page.content: {Bognor Regis}first became a holiday resort when {Sir Richard Hotham}came at the end of the 18th century.He built grand houses to impress rich people and they would come and stay.In 1876 the railway was built and this presented an easier way to travel to Bognor.In 1960 Butlins was built.It has a theatre,swimming pools and chalets to stay in.It was an enormous tourist attraction.3,000,000 people have stayed there since it was built and it has 1600 chalets.Butlins has recently been refurbished at a cost of Â£1 million.There are also a great number of camping and caravan sites around{Bognor.
